solution_line_template: {three_or_more_fraction} * {total_students} students = <<{three_or_more_fraction}*{total_students}={students_three_or_more}>>{students_three_or_more} students. So {students_three_or_more} students read three or more novels.

{two_novels_percentage} * {total_students} students = <<{two_novels_percentage}*{total_students}={students_two_novels}>>{students_two_novels} students. So {students_two_novels} students read two novels.
{one_novel_fraction} * {total_students} students = <<{one_novel_fraction}*{total_students}={students_one_novel}>>{students_one_novel} students. So {students_one_novel} students read a novel.

{total_students} students - ({students_three_or_more} students + {students_two_novels} students + {students_one_novel} students) = {total_students} students - {students_three_or_more + students_two_novels + students_one_novel} students = <<{total_students}-({students_three_or_more}+{students_two_novels}+{students_one_novel})={students_no_novels}>>{students_no_novels} students. So {students_no_novels} students don't read novels.
